title: Sheila: Babyâ€™s First Zombie Apocalypse
description: Third Floor, Apartment 305.Down the hall, second bedroom.Her name is Sheila.No one is left. City streets are abandoned and only the monsters walk free, ravenous and searching for human flesh. Wendell Jenkins walks alone, an ordinary man driven by a dark mission, one he knows will likely end his life.But the last request of a dead woman concerned for the welfare of her child leads him to a wrecked slum with a dead man in the living room and a live baby in a crib. Wendell will have to use all of his wits to keep her alive. Because the dead are hungry, and they will not rest until they have her.Will man and baby survive their wild ride through this zombie apocalypse?Scroll up and click the buy button now!
author: Brian Malbon
